alternate_methods:
##Phone
Apply by phone on 0845 606 2030.

##Post
Apply by post using the application form below (also available from some post offices).

$D
[Download 'EHIC application form' (PDF, 122KB)](http://www.nhs.uk/NHSEngland/Healthcareabroad/EHIC/Documents/ehic-app-form.pdf "EHIC application form, PDF, 122KB"){:rel="external"}
$D

You have to apply by post if you:

- are not a national of the UK, EEA or Switzerland
- are studying abroad
- are already working abroad but are UK employed or self-employed

*[EHIC]: European Health Insurance Card
*[EEA]: European Economic Area
*[EHICs]: European Health Insurance Cards
introduction:
You can fill in an online form to apply for your free European Health Insurance Card (EHIC). You can get a new card or renew an existing one. 

*[EHIC]: European Health Insurance Card
more_information:
You need to be a UK resident with a UK address to apply online.

##Lost or stolen EHICs

Call 0845 606 2030 to replace a lost or stolen EHIC.

If you're abroad, you can apply for a Provisional Replacement Certificate - call +44 (0)191 218 1999.

*[EHIC]: European Health Insurance Card
overview: Get or renew a European Health Insurance Card (EHIC) for free or reduced-cost health care in the European Economic Area (EEA) and Switzerland - it replaces the E111
title: Apply for or renew a European Health Insurance Card
